content:
Hi. I have created a profile that builds on DiagnosticReport. It is StructureDefinition XML. Is there any way to render that XML into a Logical Table?
Raw XML is hard to read for people so I would like to have something like below:
pasted image
Hi @Karol Dominiak, it's easy, uploading your StructureDefinitions to https://simplifier.net will automatically produce a nice rendering. Alternatively, you can run the IG Publisher tool.
which runs code in HAPI in a class called ProfileUtilities which you can use directly
Thank you for the response. I couldn't get IG Publisher Tool to work, ProfileUtilities from HAPI as well. For now, I have used https://simplifier.net.
